name: Tier 2
description: Unlocks the ability to research tier 2 researches.

name: Tier 3
description: Unlocks the ability to research tier 3 researches.

name: Empire Infrastructure
description: This research allows your Settlement to form an Empire as well as access to a Foundry and Hexite storages. Empires allow you to leave your mark on the world map by placing Empire Watchtowers.
